title: Egalitarian Nerds Maps
teaser: "Egalitarian Nerds Maps" is an anagram of the phrase "Presidential Anagrams." Our first president — "He's a Towering Gong," anagrammatically speaking.
contentencoded:
"Egalitarian Nerds Maps" is an anagram of the phrase "Presidential Anagrams." Our first president — "He's a Towering Gong," anagrammatically speaking.

Heard in They Might Be Wrong, Wrong, Wrong
